00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036

00044 
00045 
00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void TM_Configuration(void);
00048 void TM_MainRoutine(void);
00049 
00050 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00052   * @brief  Main program.
00053   * @retval None
00054   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00055 int main(void)
00056 {
00057   RETARGET_Configuration();           /* Retarget Related configuration                                     */
00058 
00059   TM_Configuration();
00060 
00061   while (1)
00062   {
00063     TM_MainRoutine();
00064   }
00065 }
00066 
00067 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00068   * @brief  Timer Main Routine.
00069   * @retval None
00070   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00071 void TM_MainRoutine(void)
00072 {
00073   if (TM_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_FLAG_TEV))
00074   {
00075     TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_FLAG_TEV);
00076     printf("Capture! Counter = %05d\r\n", TM_GetCounter(HTCFG_CAP_PORT));
00077   }
00078 }
00079 
00080 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00081   * @brief  Configure the Timer.
00082   * @retval None
00083   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00084 void TM_Configuration(void)
00085 {
00086   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00087     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00088     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00089     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_CAP_IPN = 1;
00090     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00091   }
00092 
00093   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00094   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_CAP_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_CAP_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_CAP_AFIO_FUN);
00095 
00096   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00097 
00098     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00099        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00100        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00101     */
00102     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00103 
00104     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = 1 - 1;
00105     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 0xFFFF;
00106     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00107     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00108     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00109     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00110   }
00111 
00112   { /* Channel n capture configuration                                                                      */
00113 
00114     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00115        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00116        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00117     */
00118     TM_CaptureInitTypeDef  CapInit;
00119 
00120     TM_CaptureStructInit(&CapInit);
00121     CapInit.Channel = HTCFG_CAP_CH;
00122     CapInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00123     CapInit.Selection = TM_CHCCS_DIRECT;
00124     CapInit.Prescaler = TM_CHPSC_OFF;
00125     #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00126     CapInit.Fsampling = TM_CHFDIV_1;
00127     CapInit.Event = TM_CHFEV_OFF;
00128     #else
00129     CapInit.Filter = 0x0;
00130     #endif
00131     TM_CaptureInit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, &CapInit);
00132   }
00133 
00134   /* Slave Trigger Input selection                                                                          */
00135   TM_StiConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_TRSEL_TI0S0);
00136 
00137   /* Slave Mode selection: Trigger Mode                                                                     */
00138   TM_SlaveModeConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_SMSEL_STIED);
00139 
00140   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, ENABLE);
00141 }
00142 
00143 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00149   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00150 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00151 {
00152   /*
00153      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00154      Debug message can be added here.
00155      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00156   */
00157 
00158   while (1)
00159   {
00160   }
00161 }
00162 #endif
